page.title: 07ASTON SOMERVILLE CHURCH
page.content: Between 15-20 people worship in the church,{St. Mary the Virgin,}each week. Family Communion using Series III service book is held at 11.15am each Sunday; Holy Communion at 8.00am on the second Sunday in the month using The Prayer Book of 1662 which is also used at evensong held only on the first Sunday in the month. There is no choir. The Parochial Church Council has 9 members, 2 Deanery Synod Representatives and 2 Church Wardens. Interest is taken in home missions, charities and the Church overseas. The church is a listed building dating from around the thirteenth century and is also listed in the Vale of Evesham tourist guides. Much restoration work has been carried out in the last four years.
